subject: Soccer
organizations: New York City Football Club (Soccer Team)
lead_paragraph: Alvaro Saborio knocked in a loose ball on a free kick in the 92nd minute, and D.C. United beat New York City F.C., 2-1.
snippet: Alvaro Saborio knocked in a loose ball on a free kick in the 92nd minute, and D.C. United beat New York City F.C., 2-1.
